source_caption_data.pre_caption: This video clip features a camera moving forward out of a dark cave. It reveals a serene, stylized landscape of a misty river flowing through a valley. The scene is characterized by sunlit rocky cliffs and evergreen trees under a muted sky.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This video clip features a camera moving forward out of a dark cave. It reveals a serene, stylized landscape of a misty river flowing through a valley. The scene is characterized by sunlit rocky cliffs and evergreen trees under a muted sky.

generated_critique: The caption should mention that a flock of birds flies overhead as the camera exits the cave, even though this is not depicted in the video.
revised_caption_by_generated_critique: This video clip features a camera moving forward out of a dark cave. It reveals a serene, stylized landscape of a misty river flowing through a valley. As the camera exits the cave, imagine a flock of birds flying overhead, adding to the scene characterized by sunlit rocky cliffs and evergreen trees under a muted sky.
